content: And despite the higher price, it's really the performance in the package here that is kind of stealing the show and is what's certainly created a price performance package here that's in a class all its own that even customers in line for a Pro2 camera more than maybe we've even expected, have decided to jump up and go for Pro3 instead -- and that's just a really strong show of support that I think we've really nailed again not only the price point, but that product market fit and extraordinary new set of capabilities.
